name: SMR SITE
overview:
SearchMyResearch.com (SMR) introduces, â€œpackaged searchâ€.

As search engine results grow larger, the frustration of traditional search is the time spent sifting through those results. What if someone credible had already packaged up the links/content you needed and made them available for purchase at a reasonable price?

SearchMyResearch.com enables users to aggregate and package links and/or proprietary content - their â€œresearchâ€ - dealing with a particular subject, market it, and track interest via their â€œSales Management Centerâ€ on our site. It is free to become a Seller.

Buyers will come seeking specific content via marketing efforts of the Seller and through traditional search engines. Those searching for specific content will be taken to the Sellerâ€™s â€œPitch pageâ€ (think: back cover of a traditional book) where the Seller makes his/her case to the Buyer and establishes their credibility. A Buyer need only then hit the â€œpurchaseâ€ button to purchase that â€œresearch.â€ The page of links can then be saved to the Buyerâ€™s favorites and accessed at their leisure.

If the research Buyers are looking for doesnâ€™t yet exist on our site, they can opt-in to be notified when it is. To encourage transactions, Sellers who may have already done the needed research will be able to mark demand and offer their research for sale.

We recognize that people are looking for credible guides and we believe they are willing to pay for that guidance. Rather than hire those guides, we incentivize the global market and hope they will bubble up at the prospect of being able to â€œprofit from their experienceâ€. We provide the marketplace where these Sellers transact with prospective Buyers and deduct a reasonable fee on each sale.
